channel.title: Reminders with notifications
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I was wondering if there was a way to add reminders with notifications on a specific time to Reminders.app via Drafts 5? Haven't come across any action.
Thanks
- Alex

item.title: Reminders with notifications
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
It is possible with scripting by adding alarms to the the reminder. It is not possible with plain Reminders steps. I also have not seen examples posted in the directory as of yet. Also pretty easy to with Fantastical reminder actions, which can parse out those values from plain text.
